refnamediv.refpurpose: The ATK interface which allows access to a DOM associated with on object.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The AtkDocument interface should be supported by any object that has an associated document object model (DOM). This interface provides the standard mechanism allowing an assistive technology access to the DOM.

refsect2.title: struct AtkDocument
refsect2.para: The AtkDocument structure does not contain any fields.

refsect2.title: atk_document_get_document_type ()
refsect2.para: Gets a string indicating the document type.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkDocumentIface
a string indicating the document type

refsect2.title: atk_document_get_document ()
refsect2.para: Gets a gpointer that points to an instance of the DOM. It is up to the caller to check atk_document_get_type to determine how to cast this pointer.

listitem.simpara: a GObject instance that implements AtkDocumentIface
a gpointer that points to an instance of the DOM.
